subject: Good day.
body:
Good day.
This is to inform you that your e-mail address found among the list of
people that has been scammed by Togo imposters, it’s might interest
you to know that a total sum of 5.5million had been set aside for
compensation which will be delivered to you in a consignment box. It’s
was endorsed by the Presidency Federal Republic of Togo in
Conjunctions with the homeland security during our first meeting this
year.
Meanwhile, you are to contact the chamber in charge in respect of
Barrister Thompson Miller with the details below.
Name: Barrister Thompson Miller
E-mail: 
info_lawyers_firm@qualityservice.com
For further progressive information on how to make sure your funds is
delivered to you kindly fill the below requirement/delivery address to
complete the shipment
Names in full:............
Contact address:..........
Residential address:......
Zip code:.................
Country:..................
Occupation:...............
Telephone number:.........
Age:......................
Marital Status:...........
Sex:......................
Nationality:..............
Copy of your international passport/drivers license:..................
Be aware that all beneficiary will be responsible for shipping charges
which cannot be deducted from the fund because there is a bond holding
the consignment that stated that only the sole beneficiary of the fund
is permitted to open it, the shipping charges is only $250usd.Also
note that the federal high Court here will alert the United State
Bureau and also your state police immediately your shipment leave the
shore of Togo, so as to avoid any restriction and problem before the
fund get to it port of destination.
Thanks
Best Regards
Federal High Court of Togo

subject: Re:    Good day.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the situation in Togo. I'm curious, how did my address end up on this list? 

Also, could you please provide more details about Barrister Thompson Miller? What is his role in this process?

I understand that there are shipping charges involved. Could you clarify how much these charges would be?

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary
